title: Quantum Computing for Developers - The Workshop
synopsis:
Regular presenter at Disobey, independent knowledge security researcher and a keen student of one of the most amazing future technologies: Quantum Computing.

Write and run a program on a real quantum computer.

By starting from effectively zero knowledge of quantum computing, we achieve this together in three hours and you'll also understand the principles underlying and not just copy a ready made example.

The workshop builds on minimal development experience, understanding of core computer science concepts like logic gates and a small part of university level math like matrices.
